articles.summary: The fast-food chain is donating 210 sats from every Bitcoin meal to open-source Bitcoin development, as well as donating to Bitcoin Foundation's research. The donation is in addition to the usual donation of $1.50 per Bitcoin meal and $2.00 per meal.

articles.title: When the CEO reads the script: Did Coinbase Brian Armstrong manipulate a market?
articles.author: Cryptoslate
articles.summary: Brian Armstrong used a line in the third-quarter earnings call to resolve live prediction market contracts on Polymarket and Kalshi. The episode sparked debates about whether the industry's most visible CEO had just mocked a niche betting venue or crossed a line that regulated.

articles.title: Steak 'n Shake Unveils Bitcoin Reserve as BTC Burger Rewards Launch Nationwide
articles.author: Bitcoin
articles.summary: Steak 'n Shake launched a Bitcoin Reserve and a Bitcoin rewards program. It's the first time a restaurant has done so.       for a digital currency in the U.S. and the world at large.  It's also a first for a restaurant.

articles.title: Bitcoin Turns 17: From 'Hacker Money' to Institutional Mainstay
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Seventeen years after its whitepaper, Bitcoin has evolved from 'hacker money' to a cornerstone of global finance and policy. BeInCrypto explains how Bitcoin has gone from "Hacker Money" to an institutional and institutional mainstay.

articles.title: Crypto Exchange Boss Found Dead in Turkish Jail, State Media Confirms
articles.summary: Faruk Fatih Ozer, the former CEO of collapsed cryptocurrency exchange Thodex, has been found dead in his prison cell in the western Turkish city of Tekirdag. He was serving an 11,196-year prison sentence for crimes including fraud and leading a criminal organization. Ozer was arrested in Albania on August 30, 2022 and extradited to Turkey in April 2023.

articles.title: Sei (SEI) Price Declines Despite Robinhood Listing
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Sei token's value plummets by over 7% following its listing on Robinhood. Sei's decline comes amid a broader crypto market downturn and technical indicators suggesting further declines in the near future. SEI's token is traded on the Robinhood app.
